mapper.select: SELECT f.file_id, f.resource_type, f.experiment_id, f.file_type, f.file_name FROM file f WHERE experiment_id = #{experimentId} AND resource_type = #{resourceType}
SELECT * FROM (SELECT * FROM user_to_course WHERE user_id = #{userId}) utc JOIN experiment e ON utc.course_id = e.course_id WHERE e.experiment_id = #{experimentId}
SELECT e.*, c.name as courseName, c.description as course_description, c.icon as course_icon FROM experiment e JOIN course c ON e.experiment_id = #{experimentId} AND e.course_id = c.course_id
